DataElement.preferredName: Human Cells or Tissue Product Content Checkbox Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator that a product contains or consists of human cells or tissues that are intended for implantation, transplantation, infusion, or transfer into a human recipient as defined under 21 CFR 1271.3.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Human Cells or Tissue Product Content
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Human cell, tissue, or cellular or tissue-based product (HCT/P) contains or consists of human cells or tissues that are intended for implantation, transplantation, infusion, or transfer into a human recipient as defined under 21 CFR 1271.3._Everything that is included in a collection, container, or communication.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Human cell, tissue, or cellular or tissue-based product (HCT/P) contains or consists of human cells or tissues that are intended for implantation, transplantation, infusion, or transfer into a human recipient as defined under 21 CFR 1271.3.

Concepts.definition: A product that contains human cells or tissue.

Property.preferredDefinition: Everything that is included in a collection, container, or communication.

Concepts.definition: Everything that is included in a collection, container, or communication.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

DataElementConcept.origin: FDA: FDA GUDID (Global Unique Device Identification Database)
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released during the November 2018 Draft New Cleanup_11.07.18

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator determining determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
